What We're About

We're a community of engineers, architects, and builders working on streaming and real-time data systems. Our focus spans Apache Kafka and modern streaming platforms, event-driven architectures, stream processing, real-time analytics, and data mesh. Whether you're just getting started or building at scale, this is a space to learn, share, and collaborate on real-time data.

Distributed Systems,
Streaming,
Data
